caption: This photograph captures a wintry scene featuring a large elk standing on a snow-covered ground. The elk is positioned to the right of the frame, its body almost fully profiled to the camera, with its head turned slightly toward the left. It has a thick coat and prominent antlers, indicating it is a male. The background is densely populated with trees, heavy with snow, reinforcing the cold, tranquil environment of a snowy forest. The sky is not clearly visible, suggesting an overcast day. The overall color palette of the image includes various shades of blue and white, contributing to the chilly atmosphere of the winter setting.
title: Elk eating epiphytes on a pine in Ish Rivers country of the Pacific Northwest, near Seattle.
